name: Beyond the Lily fields
description:
Beyond the Lily fields is a unique puzzle game in which the player goes on a small and surrealistic journey to explore the fate of a young girl named Lily. 

The main method of doing this is by zooming in and out of  environments, interacting with objects and collecting items.



 Features: 

  • Zoom in and out of the environment to solve puzzles. 
  • A narrative driven story, which reacts dynamically to player interactions, based on rhymes.
  • A simple art style.

Beyond the Lily fields was created during 7 weeks by a team of 3 programmers, 2 artists and one voice actress.

Programmers

Lukas Hron

Henrik Nyström

Lucas Karjel


Artists

Elena Orman

Ammy Runeke

Voice actress

Sabina Renck
